description: Server side event fired 7 days before a subscription is set to renew. Required by credit card payment processor.

active.description: Indicates if the subscription is currently used for allowing access to premium entitlements.

billingPlatform.description: Represents the payment processor for each subscription.

country.description: Available for subscriptions billed through the Google/Android billing platform. Indicates the subscription's country of origin.

currency.description: The billing currency code assigned to a subscription payment

currentPeriodEnd.description: The end of the current trial or billing period.

currentPeriodStart.description: The start of the current trial or billing period.

daysUntilRenew.description: The number of days until renewal, e.g. 15, 30, 60

entitlement.description: Indicates the premium product access this subscription promotes.

expiration.description: The date of the subscription's expiration. May not be the same as currentPeriodEnd in some cases.

inTrial.description: Whether the subscription is actively trialing.

invoiceRenewalDate.description: The invoice renewal date (in seconds since epoch).

platform.description: The platform the event is attributed to.

subscriptionId.description: The ID of the subscription up for renewal.

upcomingPlanId.description: The ID of the plan the user will renew to (e.g. youth plan ages out and subscribes to annual plan)
